Candy and the King

Blogging

Use this block if you have more than 1 service that you'd like to showcase. You can also use it to add text and images to other pages. You also have creative freedom to turn this square into a circle, rectangle, oval, etc.! Change the border color, remove the border. It's up to you.

Influencer Marketing

You don't only have the option to add text to this block, you can also change the color of the opacity color of the image (on this demo for the desktop version, the opacity is orange). You can also make it 100% transparent if you'd like.

Influencer Marketing

You don't only have the option to add text to this block, you can also change the color of the opacity color of the image (on this demo for the desktop version, the opacity is orange). You can also make it 100% transparent if you'd like.
ENQUIRE

Use this block to tell your audience more about you. Be descriptive and make sure your personality shines through your writing. You also want to write the way you talk so that your website comes across more personal which builds relationship and trust.

In this block, you can add links, add headings, subheadings, italics and bold text. You can also added quotes, bulleted list and numbered lists.

Use this block throughout your website if you wish for an about section, story section, mission and/or vision statement or in any way you please!
